name: Aer Lingus Regional EI3701 Full Flight - Birmingham to Cork (ATR72-500) with ATC
description:
Full flight onboard Aer Lingus ATR72-500 EI-REL, operating flight EI3701 from Birmingham (BHX) to Cork (ORK) on Monday 24 March 2014.  Flight operated by Aer Arann.

Video includes the full flight, from pushback and engine start in Birmingham to pulling on engine shutdown in Cork, including ATC on the final approach to Cork.

The approach to Cork was very bumpy, with winds at 35kt gusting to 44kt.

Video taken from seat 4F.

Flight details:  http://aviationphotos.co.uk/flights/flight_details.php?fid=255

Map of our route (from GPS logger):  http://aviationphotos.co.uk/flights/routes/EI3701-20140324.html

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
